byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes and Jeremy W. Peters contributed reporting.

snippet: As executives in music, film and publishing learned, a deal with Steve Jobs meant inclusion in one of the most important digital marketplaces on the planet. But the deals were made on Mr. Jobs’s terms.
lead_paragraph: As executives in music, film and publishing learned, a deal with Steve Jobs meant inclusion in one of the most important digital marketplaces on the planet. But the deals were made on Mr. Jobs’s terms.

headline.main: Master of the Media Marketplace, and Its Demanding Gatekeeper
headline.print_headline: Moving On, Minus Its Genius: Master of the Media Marketplace, and Its Demanding Gatekeeper
